scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Visitation, with the Virgin Mary, clad in a blue mantle, kneeling and holding the hand of Elizabeth, who is seated and wearing a white veil and brown robes. To the left, an angel with pointed wings and a brown robe stands observing the encounter. The background features a rolling landscape with stylized trees and distant castles, suggesting an outdoor setting. The interaction between Mary and Elizabeth, a key moment in the Nativity narrative, is central to the devotional purpose of the image.
